desc: Bentilia Gluten-Free Legumes Pasta is Committed to always bring the best to your table, without compromises. Our Product is Allergen-Free, Celiac-Safe, non-GMO, Kosher & Vegan Approved. Eat the Best Authentic Gluten-Free Pasta. We've red lentil pasta, black bean pasta, red lentil rotini, green lentil pasta & much more.

layout.text: Minimally processed, gluten-free & allergens Free. A natural source of vitamins & minerals.
